Â Â I'm 13 years old, a middle school student. Maybe you will think that I'm kinda bad at english ,because at China, the education of english is horrible, it cause that many middle school student are bad at english. But the point is: I am a ABC, which means "American born chinese". You maybe think that I'm kidding or lying, but I promise I'm saying the truth!!!!! I was borned at mountain view, which is a city at California. I went to Beijing when I was 6 years old, and starting to learn chinese. Right now I'm studying at a middle school at Beijing. So I think that my english skills are better than the average at china.

I'm 13, junior high school students. See here everyone must think my English strength difference, because the domestic English teaching is nearly equal to the difference, not English of junior middle school students. But I need to declare it, I am Chinese american. Don't say you don't believe, moderator applications guide inside very clearly indicates if the lie is serious punishment, so I swear, I am Chinese american. I was born in America California mountain view. The 6 year old came to China, started to learn Chinese, is now an international junior school in Beijing. So my English is much better than a lot of people power, of which the most prominent is the spoken language. In order to prove, I put these words into the English.
